EvolutionAlgorithmStatistics
public
EvolutionAlgorithmStatistics
NeatEvolutionAlgorithmStatistics

Conveys statistics related to an IEvolutionAlgorithm.

Properties
Generation
public int Generation { get; set }

The current generation number.

StopConditionSatisfied
public bool StopConditionSatisfied { get; set }

Indicates whether some goal fitness has been achieved and that the evolutionary algorithm search should stop.  This property's value can remain false to allow the algorithm to run indefinitely.

TotalEvaluationCount
public ulong TotalEvaluationCount { get; set }

Running evaluation count total.

EvaluationsPerSec
public double EvaluationsPerSec { get; set }

Evaluations per second.

Based on the difference in TotalEvaluationCount and SampleTime, between the last two generations.

SampleTime
public DateTime SampleTime { get; set }

The point in clock time that the statistics were recorded.
